definition: air commodore/top commander of air force
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The chief of staff acts as the president's gate-keeper and principal enforcer.
sentences.chinese: 陸空軍司令就是總統的守門員和主要執行者。

sentences.english: Mr Obama's choice of his chief of staff is smart.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬對其陸空軍司令的選擇是明智的。
